birth_date.invalid: The date '{date}' is invalid, either too young or in the future.

email.blacklisted: Email '{email}' is blacklisted and cannot be used.
email.malformed: Email '{email}' is either too long (> 60) or too short (< 6)
email.invalid: The given email '{email}' does not respect the email format

entity.not_found: Entity '{type}' not found using '{field}' with value '{value}'.

file.infected: The given file '{file}' is infected by a virus.
file.invalid_mime_type: The given file has not one of the expected MIME type : '[{mime_type}]'.
file.undefined_mime_type: The given file has an undefined MIME type.
file.unauthorized: You need to be in the '{visibility_group}' visibility group to access this file.

image.invalid_aspect_ratio: The given image does not respect the expected '{aspect_ratio}' aspect ratio.

jwt.unknown: An unknown error occurred while verifying the JWT token.

password.weak: Password is too weak. Please use a stronger password with at least 8 characters and a mix of letters, numbers and special characters.

promotion.logo_not_found: The promotion '{number}' does not have a logo.

user.cannot_update_birth_date_or_name: You cannot update your own birth date/name, ask another user with the appropriate permission
user.picture_cooldown: You cannot update your picture before {time_left} ms.
user.no_picture: User '{user_id}' does not have a picture.
user.no_banner: User '{user_id}' does not have a banner.

user.register: You have been successfully registered, please check your email to verify your account.
